thread.title: Re: SIT DOWN! Mary Katharine Ham slams MSM over petty attacks on Katie Pavlich
thread.title_full: Re: SIT DOWN! Mary Katharine Ham slams MSM over petty attacks on Katie Pavlich

author: Karla1953
title: Re: SIT DOWN! Mary Katharine Ham slams MSM over petty attacks on Katie Pavlich
text:
SIT DOWN! Mary Katharine Ham slams MSM over petty attacks on Katie Pavlich Posted at 2:48 pm on February 16, 2017 by Sam J. 
Man oh man, the media has been having the biggest cow over Katie Pavlich being allowed to ask questions at Trump pressers. It’s like a serious insult to these pompous windbags. Angry-That-Katie-Pavlich-Is-Allowed-to-Ask-Questions Twitter is the best media Twitter. Keep it up. 
— Tim Carney (@TPCarney) February 15, 2017 
Hrm. If that “section” of Twitter proves anything it’s that the media is a bunch of insecure babies who created Trump and can’t control him, sorta like Frankenstein. 
It’s just gotten obnoxious really: She was doing serious, critical coverage of Trump when many journalists were laughing it up about how he'd be embarrassing patsy for Hill. https://t.co/9Mz0cc6BLs 
— Mary Katharine Ham (@mkhammer) February 16, 2017 Trending
